short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that replaces all mentions of Donald Trump with "The President of the United States of America".

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For those who are tired of seeing that name everywhere and for those who want to add more perspective to everyday headlines.

Click the extension icon to turn the extension off. Click it again to turn it back on.
